name: WavePunk
description:
When 2 waves of the same frequencies join together it creates a new wave called Superposition! Certain wave frequencies can even shatter glass! Use that to your advantage in this brand new 2D Action Puzzle Platformer!

The game is about 5-10 minutes long, we really hope you enjoy playing it

For anyone struggling to beat the game I've uploaded a walkthrough, hope it helps. 


Music, SFX and Some Art by ics_de

Game Design, Programming and Most Art by T1mure

And also Voice Acting by LemonJolly
